-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- =============================================================================
-- ETL Config
-- =============================================================================
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dataDownload' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE config.dataDownload
GO
CREATE TABLE config.dataDownload (
	url nvarchar(256) NOT NULL,
	filename nvarchar(256) NOT NULL,
    filepath nvarchar(256) NOT NULL,
    downloaded BIT NOT NULL
)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO
CREATE INDEX IX_dataDownload_url_downloaded ON Config.dataDownload(url, downloaded);
GO
ALTER TABLE config.dataDownload ADD CONSTRAINT DF_dataDownload_download DEFAULT 0 FOR downloaded;
GO
